00286  * and usage.cc actually use pthreads synchronization functions. In other
00287  * cases I removed static objects where they were used for supposed

00333  * Revision 1.35  2000/09/21 16:22:10  jimg
00334  * Merged changes from Jose Garcia that add exceptions to the software.
00335  * Many methods that returned error codes now throw exectptions. There are
00336  * two classes which are thrown by the software, Error and InternalErr.
00337  * InternalErr is used to report errors within the library or errors using
00338  * the library. Error is used to reprot all other errors. Since InternalErr
00339  * is a subclass of Error, programs need only to catch Error.
